/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with buildings and construction cranes, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
